data.name: Backlash
data.description: Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will lash out for 250 elemental damage over 5 seconds to anyone who hits you.

data.name: Bane Shield
data.description: A baneful aura surrounds you for 10 seconds, lashing out for X corporeal damage at any enemies who hit you.

data.name: Blast Wave
data.description: A great burst of corrupted winds tears at all targets within 20 feet, inflicting X physical damage. Targets take a X ability penalty to wounds for 10 seconds.

data.name: Challenge
data.description: You challenge all opponents in front of you, forcing monsters to attack you. While challenged, your opponents will deal only 70% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Champion's Challenge
data.description:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for 10 seconds, and neither one of you can move.
This effect can not be dispelled or broken.

data.name: Chaotic Advantage
data.description: Any time you parry an attack, you will regain 40 action points. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Cleave
data.description: A powerful overhand blow that inflicts X physical damage.

data.name: Discordant Horror
data.note: May have three Chaotic Auras active
data.description:
Passive: The power of the Warp radiates out from you causing groupmates within 100 feet to have a 25% reduced chance to be setback.

Activated: For the next 6 seconds, groupmates will have 0.5 second faster build up times on abilities. This is increased by 2 seconds per Path of Discord chaotic aura active.

data.name: Corrupting Retribution
data.note:
May have three Chaotic Auras active.
Requires Shield.
data.description:
Passive: You instill the power of the warp in your groupmates within 100 feet, causing enemies to take X physical damage whenever they attack your groupmates.

Activated: For the next 10 seconds, 10% of all damage your groupmates would have taken, is instead directed to you.

data.name: Corrupting Wrath
data.note: May have three Chaotic Auras active
data.description:
You call upon the power of the warp to emolden your groupmates mind and muscles, causing all groupmates within 100 feet to gain a (1 * rank) unique bonus to toughness.

Activated: For the next 8 seconds, your groupmates will also gain a (7.5 * rank) morale bonus to toughness.

data.name: Corruptive Power
data.description: All chaotic auras have their cooldowns reduced by 5 seconds.

data.name: Crippling Strikes
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, they will deal only 90% damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Critical Suppression
data.description: Suppression will now also reduce the victim's chances to defend against attacks by 10% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Demolishing Strike
data.description: A powerful melee attack that causes the target to take a 1056 morale penalty to armor and deals 900 damage over 15 seconds

data.name: Destined For Victory
data.description: Any time you block an attack, you gain 200 points of morale. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Dire Shielding
data.description: Bane Shield will now also protect any of your allies within 30 feet and last 7 seconds longer.

data.name: Discordant Fluctuation
data.note: May have three Chaotic Auras active
data.description:
Passive: The power of the Warp fluctuates violently around you and your allies within 100 feet. Groupmates within 100 feet are healed for X every 3 seconds.

Activated: For the next 10 seconds, all your Path of Discord abilities heal your groupmates for 20% of the damage dealt.

data.name: Discordant Instability
data.note: May have three Chaotic Auras active
data.description:
Passive: You tear at the fabric of reality, warping the world around you. Groupmates within 100 feet gain a X ability bonus to all resistances.

Activated: Enemies within 30 feet take a X ability penalty to corporeal resistance for 10 seconds.

data.name: Dreadful Turbulence
data.note:
May have three Chaotic Auras active.
Requires Great Weapon.
data.description:
Passive: The power of the Warp melds with the mind of your enemies, causing healing used on any foes within 30 feet to be 10% less effective.

Activated: Target enemy received 50% less healing for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Distracting Bellow
data.description: A loud shout that startles your target and all enemies within 30 feet of them, reducing their damage to 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Dizzying Blow
data.description: A blow to the head which inflicts X physical damage and snares your target, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Downfall
data.description: A fierce blow that knocks down your opponent for 3 seconds and inflicts X physical damage.

data.name: Dreadful Agony
data.note: May have three Chaotic Auras active
data.description:
Passive: You call on the power of the Warp, channeling warped energy in to the hearts and minds of your opponents. All enemies within 30 feet will take X physical damage every 3 seconds.

Activated: Deal Y physical direct damage every 3 seconds for 9 seconds.

data.name: Dreadful Fear
data.note: May have three Chaotic Auras active
data.description:
Passive: You call upon the power of the warp to instill a bone chilling effect in your groupmates within 100 feet of you, causing them to gain a (1 * rank) unique bonus to strength.

Activated: Groupmates gain 10% critical chance for 10 seconds. This amount is increased by 5% for each Path of Dread chaotic aura active.

data.name: Corrupting Terror
data.note: May have three Chaotic Auras active
data.description:
Passive: The power of the Warp encases you in a terrifying visage. All groupmates within 100 feet will regain 2 action points every second.

Activated: Groupmates gain 50 action points immediately. The cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds per Path of Corruption chaotic aura active.

data.name: Embrace the Winds
data.description: All healing used on you becomes 10% more effective. Groupmates within 100 feet of you are healed for 10% of all healing you receive.

data.name: Enraged Blow
data.description: A powerful blow that does X physical damage and has significantly increased threat against monsters

data.name: Feed on the Weary
data.description: Cleave and Dizzying Blow will cause the next Cleave used within 5 second to heal you for 100% of the damage dealt.

data.name: Flawless Armor
data.description: Reduces the chance that an enemy will critically hit you by 10%.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Offense
data.description: You deal 15% more damage and all enemy monsters will hate you 15% less than normal, but your armor is reduced by 33%.

data.name: Guard
data.description: You defend one of your groupmates and try to take attacks meant for them. As long as you are within 30 feet of them, any damage that they suffer will be split evenly between the two of you, and 35% of all hate that they cause will be redirected to you.

data.name: Hastened Dismissal
data.description: Reduces Repel's cooldown time by 50% (when you are wielding a Greatweapon) and increases the length of the knockback.

data.name: Hold The Line!
data.description:
You focus your defenses against enemy fire, increasing your chances to dodge and disrupt by 45% for 12 seconds. You will also defend all allies behind you, up to 50 feet away, increasing their chances to dodge and disrupt by 15% as long as they remain at your back. Allies may have this effect stacked on them up to 3 times.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.

data.name: Immaculate Defense
data.description: An impressive display of defense which reduces incoming damage by 75% for both you and all group members within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Impenetrable Armor
data.description: You are briefly covered with an impenetrable set of scales. For the next 20 seconds, up to 7200 damage will be absorbed.

data.name: Inevitable Changing
data.description: A strong melee attack that deals 600 damage and restores all of your AP.

data.name: Juggernaut
data.description: You become filled with unstoppable power, removing all snaring, rooting, silencing, and disarming effects.

data.name: Menace
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 100% more than normal on all attacks.

data.name: Mixed Defenses
data.description: Any time you block an attack, your chance to parry is increased by 20% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Oppressing Blows
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 15% when you are wielding a greatweapon.

data.name: Oppression
data.description: A thunderous shield slam that inflicts X physical damage to all enemies within 30 feet, you gain a X ability bonus to armor for and reduces your damage taken by 15% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Petrify
data.description: The land around you warps and changes, encasing up to 4 nearby opponents in hardened stone. Effected opponents are rooted for 10 seconds and cannot move. Rooted targets have a 50% chance to break free when they suffer damage.

data.name: Piercing Repel
data.description: Repel will now apply a buff on you that will reduce the armor penetration of all attackers by 10% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Power from the Gods
data.description: Increases your action point regenration by 15.

data.name: Quake
data.description: You shake the very earth, dealing X corporeal damage to all opponents within 40 feet in front of you, staggering everyone for up to 3 seconds, preventing all actions unless they are damaged.

data.name: Quickened Discord
data.description: Reduces Blast Wave's cooldown time by 5 seconds and Touch Of Palsy's cooldown time by 10 seconds.

data.name: Ravage
data.description: You channel the fell powers of the warp into your blade unleashing a devastating strike that does X corporeal damage.

data.name: Raze
data.description: Repeatedly attack all enemies in a line in front of you, inflicting 300 damage every second for 3 seconds, up to 65 feet away.

data.name: Relentless
data.description: You hack at your enemy with brutal strikes for up to 3 seconds, striking them up to six times and dealing X physical damage with each hit. This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Rending Blade
data.description: Your Demonic blade overpowers your enemy's defense causing X corporeal damage to all enemies within 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Repel
data.description: Forceful blow that deals X physical damage and knocks back players and knocks down monsters.

data.name: Rugged
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to toughness.

data.name: Seeping Wound
data.description: Your blade churns with chaotic energies and will curse your target, inflicting X corporeal damage every 2 seconds for 10 seconds.

data.name: Sever Blessing
data.description: You sever one blessing from your enemy and do X physical damage

data.name: Shatter Faith
data.description: A thunderous curse shatters the air, inflicting 800 damage to all targets within 30 feet and dispelling a blessing.

data.name: Shield Wall
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your chance to block is almost guaranteed.

data.name: Siphoned Energy
data.description: Any time you disrupt a spell, you will regain X health, and your movement speed will be increased by 30% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Sprout Carapace
data.description: In a chaotic surge of growth, everyone in the group's skin hardens, they gain a X morale bonus to armor and a Y morale bonus to all resistances for 30 secons. Everyone receives 100 AP as well.

data.name: Suppression
data.description: A quick blow that causes X physical damage and improves your defensive position, increasing your chance to parry by 20% for 15 seconds.

data.name: Tainted Wound
data.description: Seeping Wound now effects all enemies within 30 feet. If an enemy is directly healed while suffering from your Seeping Wound, the healer will suffer X physical damage.

data.name: Taunt
data.description: You enrage your opponent, interrupting any currently building abilities and forcing monsters to attack you. While taunted your opponent will take 30% more damage from your attacks. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Throwing Axe
data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts X physical damage. Has a chance to deal Y physical damage to a severely wounded target if you are behind them.

data.name: Tooth of Tzeentch
data.description: Stabs into opponent for X corporeal damage. For the next 5 seconds, Tooth Of Tzeentch will cause an additional Y corporeal damage on the next damaging attack made by everyone in your group within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Touch of Palsy
data.description: You inflict X corporeal damage on the target. Target's legs become brittle for 10 seconds, causing them to suffer Y corporeal damage for every half second they are moving.

data.name: Tzeentch's Amplification
data.description: For 15 seconds, Tzeentch amplifies the effects of all heals cast on you by 300%.

data.name: Tzeentch's Reflection
data.description: You are surrounded by magical barrier reducing all magical damage you take by 20% for 10 seconds. During this time, any time you are struck by magical damage, you will deal X corporeal damage to enemies within 30 feet. This effect can only happen once every 0.5 seconds.

data.name: Tzeentch's Warding
data.description: Gain a 300 unique bonus to elemental resistance. Gain a 170 unique bonus to corporeal and elemental resistance.

data.name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
data.description: Juggernaut's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds.

data.name: Warped Flesh
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 2 seconds.

data.name: Warping Embrace
data.description: A surge of chaotic energy ripples forward inflicting X physical damage to everyone 40 feet in front of you. The surge of power clings to it's victims, snaring them by 40% for 15 seconds.
